methods.Synopsis: Fetch a single Federal Register document

parameters.Name: format
parameters.Description: What format the response should be

parameters.Name: fields[]
parameters.Description: Which attributes of the documents to return; by default, a reasonable set is returned, but a user can customize it to return exactly what is needed.

parameters.Name: document_number
parameters.Description: Federal Register document number

parameters.Name: format
parameters.Description: What format the response should be

parameters.Name: fields[]
parameters.Description: Which attributes of the documents to return; by default, a reasonable set is returned, but a user can customize it to return exactly what is needed.

parameters.Name: document_numbers
parameters.Description: Federal Register document numbers, separated by a comma

methods.Synopsis: Search all Federal Register documents published since 1994.

parameters.Name: format
parameters.Description: What format the response should be

parameters.Name: fields[]
parameters.Description: Which attributes of the documents to return; by default, a reasonable set is returned, but a user can customize it to return exactly what is needed.

parameters.Name: per_page
parameters.Description: How many documents to return at once; 1000 maximum.

parameters.Name: page
parameters.Description: The page of the result set.

parameters.Name: order
parameters.Description: The order the results should be returned in.

parameters.Name: conditions[term]
parameters.Description: Full text search

parameters.Name: conditions[publication_date][is]
parameters.Description: Exact publication date match

parameters.Name: conditions[publication_date][year]
parameters.Description: Find documents published in a given year

parameters.Name: conditions[publication_date][gte]
parameters.Description: Find documents published on or after a given date

parameters.Name: conditions[publication_date][lte]
parameters.Description: Find documents published on or before a given date

parameters.Name: conditions[effective_date][is]
parameters.Description: Exact effective date match

parameters.Name: conditions[effective_date][year]
parameters.Description: Find documents with an effective date in a given year

parameters.Name: conditions[effective_date][gte]
parameters.Description: Find documents with an effective date on or after a given date

parameters.Name: conditions[effective_date][lte]
parameters.Description: Find documents with an effective date on or before a given date

parameters.Name: conditions[agencies][]
parameters.Description: Publishing agency

parameters.Name: conditions[type][]
parameters.Description: Document type

parameters.Name: conditions[presidential_document_type][]
parameters.Description: Presidential document type; only available for Presidential Docuements

parameters.Name: conditions[president][]
parameters.Description: Signing President; only available for Presidential Documents

parameters.Name: conditions[docket_id]
parameters.Description: Agency docket number associated with document

parameters.Name: conditions[regulation_id_number]
parameters.Description: Regulation ID Number (RIN) associated with document

parameters.Name: conditions[sections][]
parameters.Description: Limit to documents that appeared within a particular section of FederalRegister.gov

parameters.Name: conditions[significant]
parameters.Description: Deemed Significant Under EO 12866

parameters.Name: conditions[cfr][title]
parameters.Description: documents affecting the associated CFR title

parameters.Name: conditions[cfr][part]
parameters.Description: Part or part range (eg '17' or '1-50'); requires the CFR title to be provided

parameters.Name: conditions[near][location]
parameters.Description: Location search; enter zipcode or City and State

parameters.Name: conditions[near][within]
parameters.Description: Location search; maximum distance from location in miles (max 200)

methods.Synopsis: Search all the public inspection documents that are currently on public inspection; use the document search to find documents that have been published.

parameters.Name: format
parameters.Description: What format the response should be

parameters.Name: fields[]
parameters.Description: Which attributes of the documents to return; by default, a reasonable set is returned, but a user can customize it to return exactly what is needed.

parameters.Name: per_page
parameters.Description: How many documents to return at once; 1000 maximum.

parameters.Name: page
parameters.Description: The page of the result set.

parameters.Name: conditions[term]
parameters.Description: Full text search

parameters.Name: conditions[agencies][]
parameters.Description: Publishing agency

parameters.Name: conditions[type][]
parameters.Description: Document type

parameters.Name: conditions[special_filing]
parameters.Description: Filing type

parameters.Name: conditions[docket_id]
parameters.Description: Agency docket number associated with document

parameters.Name: slug
parameters.Description: Federal Register slug for the agency

parameters.Name: id
parameters.Description: Federal Register ID for the agency (deprecated)

methods.Synopsis: Fetch all suggested searches or limit by FederalRegister.gov section

parameters.Description: Federal Register slug for the section

parameters.Name: slug
parameters.Description: Federal Register slug for the suggested search
